DOC.brief_title: Effect Weight Loss Breast Density Using Digital Mammography MRI Women Who Are At Increased Risk For Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . To determine weight loss patient undergo Roux en Y gastric bypass procedure effect breast density measure mammography breast MRI . OUTLINE : GROUP I : Participants undergo mammography MRI baseline 1 year . Participants also undergo gastric bypass surgery . GROUP II : Participants undergo mammography MRI baseline 1 year . After completion study treatment , patient follow 1 year .
DOC.criteria: Women eligible gastric bypass surgery Premenopausal woman All woman sign informed consent form prior participate study procedure Women history breast cancer Women currently take exogenous hormone replacement therapy Women currently take SERM Women currently take aromatase inhibitor Pregnant lactate woman Women pregnant lactate past 2 year Women metallic surgical implant All subject determination estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) within 24 hour undergo study gadolinium base contrast agent administered Subjects know history recent onset acute renal dysfunction Subjects history stable chronic renal dysfunction may participate study use GBCA base eGFR , outline Subjects severe liver dysfunction , particularly associate kidney disease Subjects receive GBCAs perioperative period ( i.e . within 4 week ) renal liver transplantation
